summary: Roving clans of shape-shifting human/hyena creatures prowl and hunt for human prey. They are hunted by one man seeking revenge for the death of his loved ones.
cast: Maria Bertrand|Meshach Taylor|DaJuan Johnson|Jon Seminara|Jim Morris|Ron Bard|Andrew Tinpo Lee|Rudolf Martin|Reginald James|Costas Mandylor|Steele Justiss|John Bryant|Derrick Kosinski|Maxie Santillan Jr.|Joshua Alba|Michael Domantay|Aldo Gonzalez|Mike Rad|Christa Campbell|Rebecca Wilkins|Andrew James Allen|Christina Murphy|Sean 'Hollywood' Hamilton|Stephen Monroe Taylor|Michael Nardelli|Danee Bard|Brad Hoss|Erin Harms|Bar Paly|Amanda Paytas|Amanda Aardsma|Margot Boecker|Alixzandra Dove|Wizzard Elliott|Joshua Gill|Ryan T. Husk|Kelli McNeil|Angel Monroe|Marlene Sosebee|Jules Theodore|Zander Villayne|Buppha Witt
title: Hyenas
